# CreateDirectory

This method creates a directory on the file system.

<td class="confluenceTd">Path</td>
<td class="confluenceTd">String (<a href="/t/Context-Store-Reference">Context Store Reference</a>, <a href="/t/Data-Constant-Reference">Data Constant Reference</a>)</td>
<td class="confluenceTd">Directory path. All necessary segments of the path will be created. If the directory exists, method does nothing.</td>
</tr>
